detail_desc: Set with a T-shirt and pair of trousers with straps in soft jersey. T-shirt with a ribbed neckline and press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Trousers with covered elastication at the waist and straps that cross at the back with adjustable buttoning. The cotton content of the set is organic.
Fisherman's hat in cotton with an embroidered appliqué. Lined. Width of brim 5 cm.
Trainers in a cotton weave with a hook and loop fastening at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Oversized jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a ribbed polo neck, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Straight hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with an opening and ties at the back of the neck, long puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Knee-length dress in jersey made from a viscose blend with a scallop-edged stand-up collar and an opening with buttons at the back of the neck. Short, scallop-edged sleeves, a seam at the waist and a gently flared, pleated skirt. Unlined.
Cardigan in a soft cable knit with a deep V-neck and buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and patch front pockets.
Short shorts in a viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and gently rounded hems with short slits in the sides.
Fitted top in soft, ribbed jersey with a round neck and short puff sleeves.
Clamdiggers in an airy cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly with a button. Patch front pockets, flap back pockets and shaping seams at the knees.
Slides with a wide strap over the foot and imitation leather linings and insoles. Heel approx. 1 cm.
Bracelets in various designs. Two adjustable bracelets in waxed cotton cord, one of which is decorated with wooden beads. The other two in elastic with wooden beads.
Dressing gown in terry with a hood and zip down the front with a chin guard.
Trainers with a lightly padded edge, lacing at the top and a loop at the back. Cotton twill linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in woven fabric with lace and decorative ties at the front, elastication at the top and short sleeves.
Top in sturdy jersey with a wrapover funnel collar with a drawstring. Kangaroo pocket, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Joggers in a cotton weave with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly.Side pockets, a zipped back pocket and tapered legs with elastication and a zip at the hems.
3/4-length trousers in woven fabric with a high, elasticated waist, concealed pockets in the side seams, fake welt back pockets and straight, wide legs.

Lightly padded jacket in woven fabric with a small, ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves, diagonal flap front pockets with a concealed press-stud, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined in taffeta made from recycled polyester.
Jumper knitted in soft cashmere. Short raglan sleeves with ribbed trims and ribbing around the neckline and hem.
Cotton piqué joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams an appliqué on one leg, and wide ribbing at the hems.
Calf-length skirt in a pleated weave with an elasticated waist.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops. The cotton content of the socks is organic.

Knee-length nursing dress in soft jersey with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the top, 3/4-length sleeves and a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist with a tie belt. Practical inner top for easier nursing access. Unlined.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft, patterned cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and press-studs at the crotch.
Knee-length shorts in lightweight stretch cotton twill with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Side pockets, a welt back pocket and shaping seams at the knees.
Straight-cut jersey T-shirt in a relaxed fit with a round neck.
Long-sleeved dress in a soft fine knit made from a cotton blend with a scalloped trim, around the neck and front patch pockets. Unlined.
Hoop earrings in metal decorated with pearly plastic beads. Diameter approx. 5.5 cm.
Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist and zipped side pockets. Reflective details and tapered legs with a zip at the hems.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey. The cotton content of the tops is organic.

Sleeveless body in pleated, shimmering jersey with a V-neck front and back, ties at the back of the neck, gentle gathers at the shoulders and a sewn-in wrapover at the top. Seam at the hips and press-studs at the crotch. Lined front.

Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a concealed button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem. Slim fit – a modern fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline.
Short-sleeved top in a crêpe weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck.
Polo shirt in patterned organic cotton piqué with a ribbed collar and button placket. Short sleeves with ribbed trims. Slits in the sides and slightly longer at the back.
Scarf in a soft, thin weave with fringed trims.
Metal bracelets in different designs, one with a curb chain and the other decorated with pearly plastic beads.
Cap in piqué made from a cotton blend with an adjustable tab and metal fastener at the back.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Trousers in soft, organic slub cotton jersey with an elasticated waist, fly with decorative buttons, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.
Blouse in a patterned viscose weave with a stand-up collar, covered buttons at the top and a gathered yoke. Long sleeves with cuffs and covered buttons.
Metal earrings. Length 5.5 cm.
Knee-length jersey cycling shorts with an elasticated waist.
Long, fitted jersey top with narrow adjustable shoulder straps.
Calf-length silk skirt with a waistband.

Lined, non-wired, triangle bikini top with a wide hem. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened in different ways at the back and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.
Long metal hoop earrings with a rod-shaped pendant.
Platform boots in imitation leather with a zip in one side, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Decorative welt seams and chunky soles. Platform front 4 cm, heel 5 cm.
Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with short sleeves and a round neckline with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck. Unlined.
Short shorts in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Baby Exclusive. Fine-knit hat in a soft blend of mulberry silk and cotton with a roll-edge hem.
Wide trousers in cotton twill with a high waist, pleats at the top and wide legs with close-fitting hems. Covered elastication at the back of the waist and front and back pockets.
Scarf in patterned satin. Size 80x80 cm.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, press-studs down the front and along one leg, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems.
Jumper in a soft knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cropped vest top in slub jersey.
Wide, short-sleeved top in soft jersey with dropped shoulders and a visible seam down the front and back.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with a turtle neck and long sleeves with slits at the cuffs.

Parka in a cotton weave with a detachable hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Adjustable elastication at the back of the waist, a decorative drawstring, side pockets with a fake flap and press-stud, elasticated cuffs and a single back vent. Longer at the back. Lined.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed slightly stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Fitted tops in soft jersey with short sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Shorts in a crinkled viscose weave. High waist with covered elastication, decorative ties at the front and a small frill trim at the top.
Relaxed-fit shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, a welt back pocket and short, wide legs.
Trousers in soft cotton jersey with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and full feet with elasticated heels.
Twill coat with a high stand-up collar, buttons at the front of the collar and a diagonal zip down the front. Front pockets and one inner pocket. Lined.
Long-sleeved satin top with press-studs at the back, a cut-out section with a drawstring at one shoulder and a drawstring at one side.
Long-sleeved jersey top with a reversible sequin motif on the front (size 2-3Y with normal sequins). Slightly longer at the back with a gently rounded hem.
Fully lined swimsuit with a print motif and appliqués on the front.
Bikini briefs in lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Jersey-lined joggers in a cotton weave with elasticated ribbing and a decorative drawstring at the waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Legs with shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Joggers in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Round sunglasses with plastic frames, sidepieces with a metal decoration and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with flutter sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist with decorative gathers.
Short-sleeved top in lace with a V-neck, seam with a lace band at the waist and a flared peplum. Lined.
Two pairs of leaf-shaped earrings in plastic and metal. Length 6 cm.
Boxy top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a text print, stand-up collar, zip at the top and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
